subject: Re: [junit] Remove properties in junit xml file before generating xml file using ant

JUnit doesn't produce XML, but many build tools and build plugins do. It
mi=
ght be easier to get an answer if you specify your build tool, and
possibly=
 a sample configuration file to reproduce the problem.

- Kevin

On Sep 21,=
 2017 9:47 PM, "kiran_180791@... [junit]" <
junit@yahoogroups.com> =
wrote:



I'm able to generate junit xml file, but it contains all the syst=
em
properties like passwords, ssh keys etc.so need to stop including
proper=
ties into xml output. I know we can modify the xml output and remove
the pr=
operties, But I don't know the output file location(If I apply it in
a gene=
ric way to remove in all the .xml files then it is not appropriate).
Please=
 suggest is it feasible?
